formulas.name: Coulomb's Law
formulas.description: Force between two point charges is proportional to the product of their charges and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.

formulas.name: Electric Field due to Point Charge
formulas.description: Electric field produced at a point due to a point charge.

formulas.name: Electric Potential
formulas.description: Electric potential at a point due to a point charge.

formulas.name: Ohm's Law
formulas.description: Voltage across a resistor is proportional to the current through it.

formulas.name: Resistance in Series
formulas.description: Sum of resistances connected in series.

formulas.name: Resistance in Parallel
formulas.description: Reciprocal of total resistance is sum of reciprocals of individual resistances in parallel.

formulas.name: Power
formulas.description: Power dissipated in an electrical circuit.

chapters.chapter: Magnetic Effects of Current and Magnetism

formulas.name: Magnetic Field due to Current in a Long Straight Wire
formulas.description: Magnetic field at a distance r from a long straight conductor carrying current I.

formulas.name: Force on a Moving Charge in a Magnetic Field

terms.θ: Angle between velocity and magnetic field

formulas.description: Force experienced by a charged particle moving in magnetic field.

formulas.name: Lens Maker's Formula

terms.R1: Radius of curvature of first surface
terms.R2: Radius of curvature of second surface

formulas.description: Relates focal length with radii of curvature and refractive index.

formulas.name: Mirror Formula
formulas.description: Relation between object distance, image distance, and focal length for spherical mirrors.

formulas.name: Magnification
formulas.description: Ratio of image height to object height.

formulas.name: Energy of Photon
formulas.description: Energy carried by a photon of frequency ν.

terms.K.E._max: Maximum kinetic energy of emitted electrons
